UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Improving the Activity and Selectivity of a Scorpion-Derived Peptide, A3a, against Acinetobacter baumannii through Rational Design
Literature.Author: Möller DS, van der Walt M, Oosthuizen C, Serian M, Serem JC, Lorenz CD, Mason AJ, Bester MJ, Gaspar ARM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC=128µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 700323(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µg/ml)
